name: Welcome to Glitchfield
description:
Description

A short 5-minute story-driven adventure game about a QA tester trapped in a buggy computer simulation. Made for the 49th Godot Wild Jam (the theme was "Unstable"). 

It should run pretty stable (pun intended) in most browsers (Chrome and Firefox), but if you have any probems with it please check out the native builds below. 

WARNING: This game contains flashing lights and may potentially trigger seizures for people with photosensitive epilepsy.

Controls
  • WASD keys to move
  • Mouse to look around
  • Space to jump
  • E to interact with various things
  • Left mouse button to shoot
  • Escape to pause

You can adjust the mouse sensitivity and audio volume in the pause menu (ESC).

Third party assets
  • Brid ambience sounds: BBC sound library
  • Various sound effects: Ultimate SFX Bundle
  • The narrator is a pre-recorded AI voice synth: Amazon Polly
  • Kenny's particle textures pack
  • Design of the Wildling logo as used next to the "Welcome to Glitchfield" text on the wall
  • Fonts: Josefin, Geat Vibes, Chivo
